typeProperties.command:
powershell "ls"

powershell "Write-Host 'calling Expand-Archive'"


powershell "Expand-Archive -Path svlconv.zip -Destination ."

powershell "Write-Host 'running python svlconv' "

# download files from blob container 

powershell " azcopy copy `
        'https://rastoracc02.blob.core.windows.net/nms-files-sync-aws?sv=2020-04-08&st=2021-09-30T05%3A36%3A23Z&se=2025-10-01T05%3A36%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=racwdxlt&sig=cpZ5cvnSypBK2MLh4%2B9buGQ%2FOizjqO6Dv8q2svJ4K5Y%3D' `
        '.\' `
        --include-pattern 'L89155.SVL' `
        --recursive "

powershell "python ra-SvlConvToText\main.py"

powershell " azcopy copy '.\' `
        'https://rastoracc02.blob.core.windows.net/nms-files-sync-aws?sv=2020-04-08&st=2021-09-30T05%3A36%3A23Z&se=2025-10-01T05%3A36%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=racwdxlt&sig=cpZ5cvnSypBK2MLh4%2B9buGQ%2FOizjqO6Dv8q2svJ4K5Y%3D' `
        --include-pattern 'L89155*.json;L89155_*.csv' `
        --recursive "


# upload results to blob container


powershell "ls"

powershell "Get-CimInstance -ClassName Win32_LogicalDisk | Select-Object -Property DeviceID,FreeSpace"
